description:
If on or before November 23rd 2021, 11pm ET, Manchester United Football Club announces that Ole Gunnar Solskjaer will no longer be the main coach of their first football team, or Ole Gunnar Solskjaer publicly announces resignation from the position, this market resolves to "Ole goes".

If no such announcement is made public by the resolution time this market resolves to "Ole stays".

Verified media sources will be used for the resolution of this market, especially the official website of Manchester United F.C. (https://manutd.com/), @ManUtd Twitter account, and video interviews or press conferences of Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.

Please note, if before the resolution time Mr. Solskjaer is announced to be sacked or he announces he will resign, with execution after the resolution time (ie. he will stay coach for few more games) - this market will resolve to "Ole goes".

markets.question: Will Ole Gunnar Solskjaer be sacked (or resign) as Manchester United F.C. coach by November 23rd?

title: Will Ole Gunnar Solskjaer be sacked (or resign) as Manchester United F.C. coach by November 23rd?
